item.description:
Come join me for the 8th Annual Rock n' Rib Fest for great food and entertainment on the beautiful and spacious grounds of Anheuser-Busch. This family-oriented event will feature nationally renowned professional ribbers and local award-winning restaurants providing mouth-watering ribs for everyone to enjoy. Add great entertainment for and you have a recipe for fun and excitement. As the official New Hampshire State Barbecue Championships, you will experience some of the best grillers and BBQers in the northeast vying for title of New Hampshire Barbecue Grand Champion.

What I found out last year is if we get there early , we can get parking right across the street from the brewery.We will meet at the entrance.

http://www.rotaryribf...

Entertainment:

FRIDAY - JUNE 11th

Teen Band Competition 4:00 PM - 7:30 PM

Jimmy's Down 8:00 PM - 11:00 PM

SATURDAY - JUNE 12th

Project Mess - Rock 'n' Roll 12:00 PM - 2:30 PM

The Reminiscents 3:00 PM - 5:30 PM

The James Montgomery Band 6:30 PM - 8:30 PM

Truffles 9:00 PM - 11:00 PM

SUNDAY - JUNE 13th

Mama Kicks 12:00 PM - 3:00 PM

http://rotaryribfest....

2010 Ribbers:

T-Roy's Barbecue - Amherst, NH - 2007, 2009 People's Choice winner

Big Moe’s M&M Ribs - Boston, MA - 2006 People's Choice Winner

Gator BBQ – Ontario, Canada

Firefly’s Bodacious Bar-B-Que - Marlborough, MA

Jack’s Down Home BBQ - Philadelphia, PA

Dave's Famous Bar-B-Que - Manchester, NH

Florida Skin & Bones – Tarpon Springs, FL

Unos - Nashua, NH

http://rotaryribfest....

If You Don’t Feel Like Ribs
Sweet Sausages
by the Sausage King of Nashua

Fried Clams
by the Weathervane Restaurant

Steak Tips, Chicken, Hamburgers
by Brother’s Butcher

Lobster Rolls
by Axels

Stuffed Baked Potatoes
by the Culinary Institute

Onion Rings & Bloomin’ Onions
by the Prince of Rings

Roasted Sweet Corn
by MacBrien Sweet Corn

Hotdogs
by Paul Poirier - Merrimack Policeman

Hamburgers & Grilled Cheese
In the Kid’s Area by Kevin Lemos

Pizza
by Kevin Lemos

French Fries
by Kevin Lemos

» Ice Cream
by Brusters Ice Cream

Ice Cream Treats
In the Kid’s Area by Jay & Cherri’s Ice Cream

Apple Crisp & Frozen Apple Cider
by Belgian Acre Farms

Fried Dough
by Kevin Lemos

Deep Fried Oreos
by the Sausage King of Nashua

Whoopie Pies, Cookies, Breadsb
by Saffie’s Neighborhood Bakery

Pop Corn & Fudge
by The Farm at Baptist Common

Italian Ice
by Boston Italian Ice

Kettle Corn
by Carol’s Kettle Corn

Sweet Blazes Sauces & Rubs

Dr. Gonzo’s Uncommon Condiments

W.O. Hesperus Marinades, Sauces & Dips

Ribber City Sauce Company

Cost:
$5; Children under 9 are free

Carpool location:

If you want to carpool (not recommended) please indicate in your RSVP. The carpool location is at the tennis court at the corner of Westgate Crossing and Candlewood Park Nashua at 11:30 AM. To get to Westgate Crossing, start at Route 3 and take exit 5W. Keep on Route 111. Go for about 1.5 miles. Westgate Crossing is on the left right after a nursing home. The carpool location is then the first turn on the right.
item.name: Rock'N Rib Fest, Anheuser-Busch
